Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: Joe Man Gear
Reviews.Content: I got this to cut down on clutter, but the only draw back is, my power converter over heated and melted on the wall, i'm glad i caught it before it flamed up. still great product, just be sure to check you device and how much power and resistance occurs at your power source.  I plan to step down this cord to a lower power device.

Reviews.Title: Take caution
Reviews.Author: Ash Patel
Reviews.Content: Heed the advice of the person that stated his wall plug melted.  You cannot take a wire made for 12 volts and multiply it by 4.  There are exceptions, if you are using this to power phone's, the wattage is so low there won't be a large draw.  Keep in mind, I'm not saying this product cannot handle the power, it is whatever precedes this.  Weather it is an adapter or a wire coming from a 12v distribution box.  If it cannot handle the proper amount of current, the wires will melt and possibly cause a fire.  At the end of the day, do the math, amps * voltage = watts.

Reviews.Title: Great Product For Automoblile Applications
Reviews.Author: nightowl
Reviews.Content: This item is great for installing automobile security systems with more than one power hook up.  All you have to do is install one pig tail and plug this adapter in to run up to four different 12v DC electronics.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly
Reviews.Author: tiff_tiff_tiff
Reviews.Content: This part works flawlessly if you need to take one large adapter and hook it up to multiple units. It is well designed and well constructed. I am very happy with this item.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfect
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I needed this adapter to split the output from my iPhone to multiple sources, and it worked perfectly.  Great price too.  No need to purchase a more expensive one.

Reviews.Title: good fit for vdeosecu power supply
Reviews.Author: walter
Reviews.Content: the cord connectors fit snug on Camera inputs.recommend as a companion with Videosecu power supply.no loss of signal

Reviews.Title: DC Female Splitter
Reviews.Author: Mrs Dee
Reviews.Content: I only ordered the cable in case we needed to connect something in the near future. I didn't have an immediate need but they arrived on time and the price was reasonable..

Reviews.Title: Clutter Relief
Reviews.Author: Echosyn
Reviews.Content: Strong and solid connectors with adequate wire gauge for the design load. This does the stated job of space efficiency. It also helps energy efficiency because 4 transformers rated .5 amp each use more electricity than one 2 amp transformer. Pennies add up to dollars.

Reviews.Title: Splits 1 connector into 4
Reviews.Author: igen "igen"
Reviews.Content: This power splitter cable is another one of those products that is too basic to warrant an in-depth review unless it's defective.  Mine works fine, so I don't have anything to complain about.  Why not 5 stars, then?  Because it isn't exactly a revolutionary product and "I love it" seems a bit over-the-top for such a basic item.Just be sure to double-check the specs of all the devices that you intend to power with this.  Sum up the current (A or mA) for all the devices and make sure it doesn't exceed the rated current of your power supply.

Reviews.Title: It's a splitter cable
Reviews.Author: S. M. Baker
Reviews.Content: Not much to say. It's a splitter cable. I used it to power multiple devices off of just one wall wart. The plug is the same size used by most CCTV equipment, and used by lots of other devices as well. Make sure your wall wart is supplies enough current to power all of the devices you intend to power from this splitter.

Reviews.Title: power splitter
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: very good quality and fast shipping. I found this to be cheaper than some other items like this by other sellers. I would recommend this item.

Reviews.Title: What's to love?
Reviews.Author: BobL
Reviews.Content: How can anybody love this thing? I love my umbrella, but this thing? just kidding, it is worth 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: work great
Reviews.Author: Rc Morrison
Reviews.Content: These are perfect for my application which is running serveral 12 volt LED lamps that only require small amperage.  I can gang three or four on one 1 amp adapter which saves a lot of $ and hassel.

Reviews.Title: Use one power supply for multiple cameras - GREAT!
Reviews.Author: DaveFromRI "Mr. Critical"
Reviews.Content: It's hard to review a cable that has four plugs, but it does work very well and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Cord
Reviews.Author: Requiem3k
Reviews.Content: I got this cord in hopes of powering several hard drives off of one cord.  The only problem was the male ends of the cord do not fit.  So, I guess, if your sure the male ends fit what you want you have a great cord.  Unfortunately it didn't meet my needs.

Reviews.Title: this is perfect for my car camera
Reviews.Author: kevinhaett
Reviews.Content: this is perfect for my car camera. i can add maybe 3 more cameras to my car if i wanted too

Reviews.Title: portable and fast shipping with very little wait time
Reviews.Author: Diana Roser
Reviews.Content: strong wiring harness and light weight but cannot use it with the cam i purchased. good quality and great price.

Reviews.Title: Splitter cable
Reviews.Author: J tipton
Reviews.Content: Arrived very quickly was well packaged and my questions about this product before I bought were answered very quickly. I am using this item to reduce the number of plugs used for my home security system. Having 16 cameras all plugged into a couple of outlets which isn't very safe. After installation about a month ago everything is working great and I don't lose any sleep thinking the house my burn down from the over loaded outlets.

Reviews.Title: just what i needed, perfect
Reviews.Author: David Smith "Dave 1445"
Reviews.Content: perfect, just what i needed to power 4 cameras. the connectors fit tight and i have had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Needed to add some more cameras to my security system.  Not to much to say here.  It works and was a good price.  As almost always, Amazon is the place to go.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SERVICE
Reviews.Author: JOEG
Reviews.Content: I received the product in a timely manor, just as described.The cables are needed to allow the connection of multiple cameras to a single power source.

Reviews.Title: Splitter
Reviews.Author: BigBoy
Reviews.Content: I installed the camera system myself and this product completed the job. Clear as day.  Great product that I would definitely recommend..
